events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I am quite disappointed.
The system has categorized this case as a Refund based on the customer's mention of requesting money back after a purchase issue.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m Sarah from customer support and I’ll assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if you have already returned the jacket to our warehouse?
Sure, my order number is 45871239. I haven't sent the jacket back yet because I wanted to confirm the refund process with you first.
Thank you for the info. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and we will process your refund within 5 business days of receiving the item.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I’ll ship it tomorrow and await the refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear back on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can help you with today.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thanks again for your help and excellent service.
We are glad to hear that the refund was received. Closing this case now, and please reach out if you need anything in the future.
